# Introduction

In the following code, I perform a text analysis of President Joe Biden's State of the Union Address of 2022.

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(tidytext)
library(textdata)
library(pdftools)
library(readtext)

# sotu <- read.table(file = here("data","biden_sotu.txt"))
sotu_raw <- readtext(file = here::here("data","biden_sotu.txt")) %>%
  str_squish() %>% 
  tolower() %>%
  str_remove_all(pattern = "[[:punct:]]") 

#make each word an observation
sotu <- sotu_raw %>%
  data.frame() %>%
  mutate(word = str_split(., pattern = " ")) %>%
  unnest(word) %>%
  select(word) %>%
  anti_join(stop_words, by = "word")

  
  


  
```
